title: Can't set club tag
body: I right right clicked a club and selected "Show this club tag", but club tag doesn't show in-game.

replies.body: This image doesn't show anything.  :/  Have you relogged yet, just in case of a syncing issue?  What's the club name and tag?
I cant put a tag theres no button to set it up.
nevermind. i went to the settings and clicked "show club tags". now it shows.
